name: Baba Yaga (itch) (cardvark61)
description:
This is a short game that I made for the GDKO 2023 Jam. It is in a pretty rough state, but it is still kind of fun. Even if I don't do well in the jam, I learned a lot about timing, even though this isn't my first jam.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, Right click to select weapon, hold LMB to fire. Press R to go back to the menu.

While you are technically only supposed to move left and right, some mechs have trouble with slopes, so I added the ability to "fly" by holding the Up arrow. 

Notes:

-Each mech loads into a different layout. The layouts are virtually identical, but I do not know if this is not allowed for the jam, since it specifies 1 level only

-The player is currently indestructible

-I do not know if the game is framerate dependent or if it is choppy at different framerates

-I know that the walking animations are weird looking
